meanings.definition: The lowest point on the lower jaw.
meanings.sent1: He pointed to his gnathion while explaining the jaw structure.
meanings.sent2: The dentist examined the gnathion to assess the jaw alignment.
meanings.sent3: The gnathion seemed to be the shyest part of the jaw, always hiding.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the gnathion of a lion.
meanings.sent5: The gnathion, like a tiny anchor, held the jaw in place.

meanings.definition: The most inferior point of the chin.
meanings.sent1: She touched her gnathion absentmindedly while thinking.
meanings.sent2: His beard covered the gnathion, giving his chin a rugged look.
meanings.sent3: The gnathion on his chin seemed to have a mind of its own, always attracting attention.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as the gnathion of a porcelain doll.
meanings.sent5: The gnathion, like a tiny button, completed the chin's appearance.
